Headline: 55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near 55th/ Blackstone
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th,Lake Park,Woodlawn, and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th / Blackstone.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th,Lake Park,Woodlawn, and 55th, due to street blockage near 55th / Blackstone.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Belmont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Belmont.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
